text: Solomon my zdiysnyly viter u yoho rozporyadzhenni, mandruyuchy odyn misyatsʹ prybuttya ta odyn misyatsʹ iduchyy. Ta my vyklykaly beremo pochatok z naftu khlynuty dlya nʹoho. Takozh, jinns popratsyuvav dlya nʹoho, yoho vid'yizdom Lorda. Budʹ-yakyy odyn z nykh khto disregarded nashi komandy, my piddaly yoho do suvoroho retribution
